languages.text: "Зачем ты спрашиваешь его? Он виновен пред заветами Империума. Ты можешь распоряжаться его телом по праву".
"Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."
languages.original_text: "Зачем ты спрашиваешь его? Он виновен пред заветами Империума. Ты можешь распоряжаться его телом по праву".

traits.locale_text: "Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."
"Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."
"Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."
"Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."
"Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."

languages.text: 「なぜ彼に尋ねているのか？帝国によると彼は有罪だ。さあ、彼の体をどうするか決めるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ彼に尋ねているのか？帝国によると彼は有罪だ。さあ、彼の体をどうするか決めるのだ」

languages.text: “你为什么要问他的意见？根据帝国的法律，他犯了罪，应当由你来决定如何处理他的躯壳。”
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."

traits.locale_text: “你为什么要问他的意见？根据帝国的法律，他犯了罪，应当有你来决定如何处理他的躯壳。”

languages.text: "Warum fragt Ihr ihn? Er ist nach dem Wort des Imperiums schuldig. Nun entscheidet Ihr, was mit seinem Körper geschehen soll."
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."

traits.locale_text: "Warum fragt Ihr ihn? Er ist nach dem Wort des Imperiums schuldig. Nun entscheidet Ihr, was mit seinem Körper geschehen soll."

languages.text: « Pourquoi lui demandez-vous son avis ? Il est coupable selon le jugement de l'Imperium. C'est à vous de décider ce qu'il advient de son corps. »
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi lui demandez-vous son avis ? Il est coupable selon le jugement de l'Imperium. C'est à vous de décider ce qu'il advient de son corps. »

languages.text: «¿Por qué le pregunta a él? Ha sido declarado culpable por el Imperium. Usted es libre de decidir qué hacer con su cuerpo».
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué le pregunta a él? Ha sido declarado culpable por el Imperium. Usted es libre de decidir qué hacer con su cuerpo».

languages.text: "Neden ona soruyorsunuz ki? İmparatorluk'un gözünde bir suçlu o. Bedenine ne olacağına siz karar vereceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "Why are you asking him? He is guilty by the word of the Imperium. Now you decide what to do with his body."

traits.locale_text: "Neden ona soruyorsunuz ki? İmparatorluk'un gözünde bir suçlu o. Onun bedenine ne olacağına artık siz karar veriyorsunuz."
